description: This source file implements functions related to process hibernation and wakeup in a checkpoint library, including managing process metadata, and includes function definitions for hibernating and resuming processes.

methods.name: uint32_t HibernateProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Initializes process checkpoint metadata, stores it, and invokes a (TODO) checkpoint function.

methods.name: uint32_t WakeupProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Resumes a process from checkpoint by verifying metadata, invoking a (TODO) resume function, and freeing the metadata.
